scripts.build: pnpm --filter @code-launcher/client-with-vite run build && pnpm --filter @code-launcher/server-with-fastify run build
scripts.prepublishOnly: pnpm run build && npm version patch --force && cd packages/publish && npm version patch --force && cd ../.. && cp packages/publish/package.json build/package.json && cp README.md build/README.md
scripts.publish:custom: pnpm run prepublishOnly && npm pack && npm publish
